summary: AN ORDINANCE relating to the permit granted to the Swedish Hospital Medical Center to construct, maintain and operate a pedestrian Skybridge across Marion Street, west of Summit Avenue by Ordinance 102171, amending Section 6 thereof by increasing the amount of the Surety Bond, Section 7 thereof by increasing the amount of the Liability Insurance, and Section 9 thereof, by increasing the annual fee; and providing for acceptance of amendments thereto.
